name: Style Reference Library
summary: An expanding library of themed **Style Reference** cards that package visual DNA copy, inspiration tags, and synchronized light/dark design tokens. Use them to seed new products, remix palettes, or hand teammates a ready-to-go art direction.

cardInfo.title: Style Reference Library
cardInfo.description: Visual language kits for quickly aligning teams on color, mood, and typography across light and dark modes.
cardInfo.notes: Each reference includes paired CSS variables, inspiration tags, and wallpapers for instant context.
